body.name: OPPSDECOR 600lbs 6 in 1 Weight Bench Set with Squat Rack Adjustable Workout Bench with Leg Developer Preacher Curl Rack Fitness Strength Training for Home Gym
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: [Versatile Workout Bench]: This adjustable weight bench is great for a wide variety of full-body workouts, such as Flat Bench Presses/Incline Dumbbell Bench Press/One-Arm Dumbbell Preacher Curl etc. With two pull-up grips to exercise arm muscles, supine board allows you to exercise abdominal and leg muscles.

[Foldable & Adjustable]: You can make different adjustments according to your different needs. Backrest adjusts for flat/incline positions. Adjustable uprights can be adjusted to 5 levels. Height adjustable and folded design brings more convenience to your exercising.

[Thoughtful Design & Senior Leather]: This bench press has the senior Imitation Leather seats and backrest pad for long-lasting comfort when lifting and sitting down. Add safety and stability during workout.
[Easy to storage]: After you use it, you can fold up the barbell rack easily, fix it with the bottom pin to reduce its footprint. Then you can move it to the corner for placement.
[GUARANTEE]: Buy this item with confidence. If there any issue with it, don't hesitate to contact us, and we will response and solve it within 24 hours. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

[Effective Trainer]: Strong 5 in 1 bench press & rack set for barbell and dumbbell, this multifunctional machine is ideal for you to more easily emphasize lower abdominal muscles and build the abs you want in less time.
[Anti-slip design]: The bench press thick base has 4 non-slip mats can fully ensure the stability of the product, allowing guests to exercise more safely.
[Use it your way]: You can do incline dumbbell bench press,one-arm dumbbell preacher curl as well as leg extension with it.

Yes, Our weight bench press suitable for a wide range of people, ages from 10+ to 80+, unisex, meet the requirements of different fitness levels, making you exercise at your own pace and get promoted progressively Is this adjustable weight bench set easy to install? Does it come with weights or just the bench and bar? It comes with the bench, a barbell squat rack, 2x elastic rope and handle attachments for dip workouts. No barbell or weights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Space-Saving: A 5-Star Home Gym Addition
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the OPPSEDECOR 600lbs 6 in 1 Weight Bench Set for my home gym, and I have to say, it has exceeded all of my expectations. As someone who values both high-quality workouts and efficient use of space, this bench has been a game-changer.The assembly process was straightforward, and I was impressed by the robustness of the construction. The bench supports a variety of exercises, and the squat rack is a welcome addition for my leg day routines. I particularly enjoy the added functionality of the leg developer and preacher curl rack, which allows for a comprehensive full-body workout.What I appreciate most is how easily the bench can be folded up and tucked away in the corner of my basement. Living in the New York metro area, space is at a premium, so equipment that combines functionality with a small footprint is crucial. This bench fits the bill perfectly. Despite its sturdy build, it's not cumbersome to move, making it ideal for those who need to optimize their training area when not in use.The 600-pound weight limit is indicative of the quality and stability of the bench. I have lifted heavy without any wobble or concern for safety. The padding is comfortable for long sessions, and the adjustment mechanisms are user-friendly, allowing me to switch between exercises with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid investment for home workouts
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this weight bench for about 2 months now, and I can honestly say it's been a fantastic addition to my home gym.Here's what I love about it:- Sturdy and well-built: The bench feels incredibly solid and can handle my weight without any wobbling or creaking. This is crucial for safely performing exercises like bench presses and incline dumbbell rows.- Adjustable backrest: Having the ability to adjust the backrest angle is a game-changer. It allows me to target different muscle groups effectively, from flat bench presses to decline sit-ups.- Comfortable padding: The padding is thick and supportive, making even long workout sessions comfortable. I appreciate that it doesn't feel cheap or flimsy.- Easy to assemble: The assembly process was straightforward and took me less than 30 minutes. The instructions were clear and easy to follow, even for someone like me who isn't mechanically inclined.- Compact and space-saving: This bench folds up nicely, which is great for storing it away when not in use. This is especially helpful for those who have limited space at home.- Great value for money: Overall, I believe this weight bench is an excellent value for the price. It's well-built, comfortable, and versatile, making it perfect for anyone who wants to get a good workout at home.Some additional points:- I've been using this bench with both dumbbells and a barbell, and it's been great for both.- The bench feels stable even when using heavier weights.- The non-slip feet help keep the bench in place during workouts.If you're looking for a high-quality, affordable weight bench for your home gym, I highly recommend this one. It's been a game-changer for my workout routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't overly complicated to assemble, stores/folds up easily, and is plenty sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the relative ease of assembly, sturdiness, compactness once folded up, functionality, and comfort when laying down. It's plenty long enough for an average sized person. Pay close attention when assembling, as I did have to redo some steps. That's sort of on me, and sort of on the instructions not being perfect. Though overall, I would consider this a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformative Addition to My Home Gym!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Weight Bench for my home gym, and it has been an absolute game-changer for my fitness routine! From the moment I unpacked it, I could tell that this bench was built with quality and durability in mind.First and foremost, assembly was a breeze. The clear and concise instructions made the process seamless, and all the necessary tools were included. Within no time, I had a sturdy and well-constructed weight bench ready to take my workouts to the next level.The versatility of this bench is truly impressive. Whether I'm doing incline presses, flat bench exercises, or even utilizing it for core workouts, the bench adapts effortlessly. The adjustable backrest and seat provide multiple angles to target different muscle groups, allowing for a diverse range of exercises.One standout feature is the robust build. The heavy-duty steel frame not only ensures stability during intense workouts but also gives me the confidence that this bench will stand the test of time. The high-quality upholstery is not only comfortable but also easy to clean, maintaining its aesthetic appeal even after rigorous use.The bench is designed with user comfort in mind. The padding on the backrest and seat is just right – not too soft, not too firm – striking the perfect balance for a comfortable workout experience. The bench's capacity is more than sufficient for my needs, accommodating both beginners and seasoned lifters alike.What sets this weight bench apart is its compact design. It doesn't take up much space in my home gym, yet it manages to provide all the features I need for a comprehensive workout. The foldable design is a fantastic space-saving feature, allowing me to tuck it away neatly when not in use.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of this weight bench. It has become the focal point of my home gym, and I look forward to every workout session with it. If you're in the market for a reliable, versatile, and well-built weight bench, look no further – this one checks all the boxes!
